name: Tosh the Haggis - Pico 8 Experiment
description:
I made this experiment back in 2020 and I finally decided to polish it up a bit and release it. Contains:

  • Speed!
  • Momentum!
  • Horizontally looped level!
  • Loops!
  • Damage!
  • Collectables!
  • Music!
  • Rain!

Source code is in the Pico 8 cart.
